name: CHMUP
description:
- About -

Chmup was written in C, using the Raylib framework for the (not so) Basic Shmup Jam!

9 waves and a bossfight await!

- Controls -

Move: Arrow Keys / Analog stick / D-Pad

Shoot: X / Z / Shift / Face buttons

Use Power: Spacebar / Select / Share

Start or Pause: Enter / Escape / Start

All music and art was created by me for and during the jam.
